# title

**Instance Property**

The displayed name of the asset collection.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to change the asset collection’s title.

## Modifying Asset Collections

- **init(for:)**: Creates a request for modifying the specified asset collection.
- **init(for:assets:)**: Creates a request for modifying the specified asset collection, with a fetch result for tracking changes.
- **addAssets(_:)**: Adds the specified assets to the asset collection.
- **insertAssets(_:at:)**: Inserts the specified assets into the collection at the specified indexes.
- **removeAssets(_:)**: Removes the specified assets from the asset collection.
- **removeAssets(at:)**: Removes the assets at the specified indexes from the asset collection.
- **replaceAssets(at:withAssets:)**: Replaces the assets at the specified indexes in the asset collection with the specified assets.
- **moveAssets(at:to:)**: Moves the assets at the specified indexes in the asset collection to a new index.
